compounddef.innerclass: dyablo::Units::Unit_traits< Unit< T, L, M, C, Temp, Mol, LI > >

briefdescription.para: Is type a unit or not?
Multiply Units to create derived units.
Divide Units to create derived units.

detaileddescription.para: Helper template function to perform controlled conversions from other types to units Version for Units : Units are already units
Helper template function to perform controlled conversions from other types to units Version for floats : Automatically convert floats to dimensionless Units (in operators only)

briefdescription.para: Units can be multiplied with types compatible with to_unit() on both sides.
Units can be divided with types compatible with to_unit() on both sides.
Units can be added with types compatible with to_unit() on both sides.
Units can be substracted with types compatible with to_unit() on both sides.
